text: The Goo Goo Dolls are a rock band formed in 1986 in Buffalo, New York by John Rzeznik and Robby Takac. "Iris" is one of their most popular songs. Category:American punk bands Category:American rock bands Category:Grunge bands Category:Musical groups from New York (state) Category:Musicians from Buffalo, New York Category:Warner Bros. title: Goo Goo Dolls
